attributes.action: MP's Should not have second homes at Taxpayers Cost
attributes.additional_details:
MP's should not be allowed to claim for second homes at Taxpayers cost - Rather a hotel or even a property can be owned/Rented by the government which can be used by MP's when they are visiting
OR the second property owned by the MP should be government owned -

MP's should be standing for areas in which they do not reside.
